trans-unit.source: Introduction to Azure Backup | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Introduction to Azure Backup | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This article provides an overview of the Azure Backup service which enables customers to backup data to Azure and in Azure
trans-unit.target: This article provides an overview of the Azure Backup service which enables customers to backup data to Azure and in Azure

trans-unit.source: Introduction to Azure Backup
trans-unit.target: Introduction to Azure Backup

trans-unit.source: This article provides a high level overview of Microsoft's cloud integrated backup solution that enables customers to back up their data present either on-premises or in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This article provides a high level overview of Microsoft's cloud integrated backup solution that enables customers to back up their data present either on-premises or in Azure.

trans-unit.source: What is Azure Backup?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Backup?

trans-unit.source: Azure Backup is a multi-tenanted Azure service that enables you to back up your data present anywhere: on-premises or in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure Backup is a multi-tenanted Azure service that enables you to back up your data present anywhere: on-premises or in Azure.

trans-unit.source: It replaces your existing on-premises or offsite backup solution with a reliable, secure and cost competitive cloud based offering.
trans-unit.target: It replaces your existing on-premises or offsite backup solution with a reliable, secure and cost competitive cloud based offering.

trans-unit.source: It also provides the flexibility of protecting assets running in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: It also provides the flexibility of protecting assets running in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Azure Backup is built on top of a world class infrastructure that is scalable, durable and highly available.
trans-unit.target: Azure Backup is built on top of a world class infrastructure that is scalable, durable and highly available.

trans-unit.source: Using this solution, you can back up data and applications from their System Center Data Protection Manager (SCDPM) servers, Windows servers, Windows client machines or Azure IaaS virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Using this solution, you can back up data and applications from their System Center Data Protection Manager (SCDPM) servers, Windows servers, Windows client machines or Azure IaaS virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: Azure Backup and SCDPM are the fundamental technologies which make up Microsoft's cloud-integrated backup solution.
trans-unit.target: Azure Backup and SCDPM are the fundamental technologies which make up Microsoft's cloud-integrated backup solution.

trans-unit.source: Cloud Design point
trans-unit.target: Cloud Design point

trans-unit.source: Traditional backup solutions have evolved to treat the cloud as an endpoint similar to disk or tape.
trans-unit.target: Traditional backup solutions have evolved to treat the cloud as an endpoint similar to disk or tape.

trans-unit.source: While this approach is simple, easy to deploy and provides a consistent experience, it has limited uses and does not take full advantage of the underlying platform.
trans-unit.target: While this approach is simple, easy to deploy and provides a consistent experience, it has limited uses and does not take full advantage of the underlying platform.

trans-unit.source: This translates to an inefficient, expensive solution for end customers.
trans-unit.target: This translates to an inefficient, expensive solution for end customers.

trans-unit.source: By treating Azure as "just as a storage endpoint", backup solutions are unable to tap into the richness and power of the public cloud platform.
trans-unit.target: By treating Azure as "just as a storage endpoint", backup solutions are unable to tap into the richness and power of the public cloud platform.

trans-unit.source: Azure Backup, on the other hand, delivers a true service which uses the cloud to deliver a powerful & affordable backup solution.
trans-unit.target: Azure Backup, on the other hand, delivers a true service which uses the cloud to deliver a powerful & affordable backup solution.

trans-unit.source: It integrates with your on-premises backup solution (SCDPM) to provide an end-to-end hybrid solution.
trans-unit.target: It integrates with your on-premises backup solution (SCDPM) to provide an end-to-end hybrid solution.

trans-unit.source: The advantages to this approach are:
trans-unit.target: The advantages to this approach are:

trans-unit.source: Efficient cloud storage architecture that provides low-cost, resilient data storage
trans-unit.target: Efficient cloud storage architecture that provides low-cost, resilient data storage

trans-unit.source: Nonintrusive, auto scaling of the service with high availability guarantees
trans-unit.target: Nonintrusive, auto scaling of the service with high availability guarantees

trans-unit.source: Consistent way to back up on premise, hybrid and IaaS deployments
trans-unit.target: Consistent way to back up on premise, hybrid and IaaS deployments

trans-unit.source: The key features of this solution are:
trans-unit.target: The key features of this solution are:

trans-unit.source: **Reliable service**: By adopting Azure Backup, you get a backup service which is highly available.
trans-unit.target: **Reliable service**: By adopting Azure Backup, you get a backup service which is highly available.

trans-unit.source: The service is multi-tenanted and you do not have to worry about managing the underlying compute or storage.
trans-unit.target: The service is multi-tenanted and you do not have to worry about managing the underlying compute or storage.

trans-unit.source: **Reliable storage**: Azure Backup is built on top of reliable cloud storage which is backed by high SLAs.
trans-unit.target: **Reliable storage**: Azure Backup is built on top of reliable cloud storage which is backed by high SLAs.

trans-unit.source: You do not have to worry about capital or operation expenses in maintaining the storage.
trans-unit.target: You do not have to worry about capital or operation expenses in maintaining the storage.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore you have the choice of backing up to LRS (Locally Redundant Storage) or GRS (Geo Replication storage) storage.
trans-unit.target: Furthermore you have the choice of backing up to LRS (Locally Redundant Storage) or GRS (Geo Replication storage) storage.

trans-unit.source: While LRS enables 3 copies of the data in the same geo which protects against local hardware failures; GRS provides 3 additional copies (a total of 6 copies) in a paired data center.
trans-unit.target: While LRS enables 3 copies of the data in the same geo which protects against local hardware failures; GRS provides 3 additional copies (a total of 6 copies) in a paired data center.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that your backup data is highly available.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that your backup data is highly available.

trans-unit.source: Even if there is an Azure-site-level disaster, the backup data is safe with us.
trans-unit.target: Even if there is an Azure-site-level disaster, the backup data is safe with us.

trans-unit.source: **Secure**: Azure backup data is encrypted at source, during transmission and stored encrypted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: **Secure**: Azure backup data is encrypted at source, during transmission and stored encrypted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The encryption key is stored at source and is never transmitted or stored in Azure.
trans-unit.target: The encryption key is stored at source and is never transmitted or stored in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The encryption key is required to restore any of the data and only the customer has full access to the data in the service.
trans-unit.target: The encryption key is required to restore any of the data and only the customer has full access to the data in the service.

trans-unit.source: **Offsite protection**: Rather than paying for offsite tape backup solutions, customers can backup to Azure which provides a compelling solution with tape-like-semantics at a very low cost.
trans-unit.target: **Offsite protection**: Rather than paying for offsite tape backup solutions, customers can backup to Azure which provides a compelling solution with tape-like-semantics at a very low cost.

trans-unit.source: **Simplicity**: Azure Backup provides a familiar interface that can scale to protect a deployment of any size.
trans-unit.target: **Simplicity**: Azure Backup provides a familiar interface that can scale to protect a deployment of any size.

trans-unit.source: As the service evolves, features like central management will allow you to manage your backup infrastructure from a single location.
trans-unit.target: As the service evolves, features like central management will allow you to manage your backup infrastructure from a single location.

trans-unit.source: **Cost effective**: Azure Backup pricing includes a per-instance backup management fee and cost of storage (block blob price) consumed on Azure.
trans-unit.target: **Cost effective**: Azure Backup pricing includes a per-instance backup management fee and cost of storage (block blob price) consumed on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Unlike other cloud based backup offering, Azure Backup does not charge its customers for any restore operation.
trans-unit.target: Unlike other cloud based backup offering, Azure Backup does not charge its customers for any restore operation.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, customers are not charged for any egress (outbound) data transfer cost during a restore operation.
trans-unit.target: Furthermore, customers are not charged for any egress (outbound) data transfer cost during a restore operation.

trans-unit.source: **Backup in Cloud**: Azure Backup provides VSS-based application-consistent backup of Azure IaaS virtual machines running without the need to shut down the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: **Backup in Cloud**: Azure Backup provides VSS-based application-consistent backup of Azure IaaS virtual machines running without the need to shut down the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: It can also backup Linux virtual machines in Azure with filesystem consistency.
trans-unit.target: It can also backup Linux virtual machines in Azure with filesystem consistency.
